title: Element Dragons in a nutshell ;
body:
Water ...

http://twinfinite.net/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/water-dragon-562x350.png

Earth ...

http://twinfinite.net/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/earth-dragon-561x350.png

Fire ...

http://twinfinite.net/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/fire-dragon.png

Air ...

http://twinfinite.net/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/air-dragon-562x350.png

Long ago , the four nations lived together in harmony. 

Then , everything changed when the fire nation attacked.

https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/2/22/Animated_fire_by_nevit.gif

Only the Avatar , the master of four elements could stop them.

http://twinfinite.net/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/elder-559x350.png

replies.body:
But when the world needed him most, he vanished.
https://i.gyazo.com/ac7a3cca1e17b7524e6da56d0b72c57e.png

 A hundred years passed and my brother and I discovered the new Avatar, an airbender named Aang.
https://i.gyazo.com/66ef83bc5ce2c7dc97495d62eb821e29.jpg

And although his airbending skills are great, he has a lot to learn before he's ready to save anyone.
https://i.gyazo.com/0072e9753eada0bacab21d6f88e88801.png ?

thats Legend of Korra, not Last Airbender

Water... fire.... earth... air....
With your powers combined
I came hoping to see a captain planet joke...
No there would have to be a heart dragon for that.
Then Elder Dragon must be patched with a pink recolor!  Please Riot, show us you are not heartless!

no heart dragon

no captain planet.
